mapper.select: select no ,pro_name, pro_brand, pro_price, pro_saleprice, PRO_THUMBNAIL from product
select no ,pro_name, pro_brand, pro_price, pro_saleprice, pro_stock, c.cat_name cat_name, PRO_THUMBNAIL from product p, category c where c.cat_code = p.cat_code

select pro_option_name, pro_option_detail_name, pro_add_price, sum(pro_saleprice + pro_add_price)sum from pro_add_option pao,pro_option po, pro_option_detail pod, product p where pao.pro_option_code = po.pro_option_code and pao.pro_option_detail_code = pod.pro_option_detail_code and pro_no=#{no} GROUP BY pro_option_name, pro_option_detail_name, pro_add_price
select distinct pro_option_name from pro_add_option pao, pro_option po where po.pro_option_code=pao.pro_option_code and pro_no=#{no}

select distinct pro_option_detail_name from pro_option po, pro_add_option pao, pro_option_detail pod where po.pro_option_code= pao.pro_option_code and pod.pro_option_detail_code= pao.pro_option_detail_code and pro_option_name=#{pro_option_name}
select count (*)cnt from pro_add_option where pro_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into product values( seq_product.nextval, pro_name=#{pro_name}, pro_brand=#{pro_brand}, pro_price=#{pro_price}, pro_saleprice=#{pro_saleprice}, pro_stock=#{pro_stock}, pro_delivery=#{pro_delivery}, sysdate, 0, pro_content=#{pro_content}, cat_code=#{cat_code}, PRO_THUMBNAIL=#{PRO_THUMBNAIL} )
mapper.update: update product set pro_hit=pro_hit+1 where no=#{no}
